picks.text: The first OLED iPad is introduced
picks.full-pick-text: The first OLED iPad is introduced

picks.text: The Apple Watch 10 brings an updated design inspired by the Apple Watch Ultra in some way
picks.full-pick-text: The Apple Watch 10 brings an updated design inspired by the Apple Watch Ultra in some way
picks.notes: • Ungraded: "Action Button, flat glass or crown guard, for example"

picks.text: The keyboard for iPad Pro is substantially redesigned for the first time since its introduction in 2020
picks.full-pick-text: The keyboard for iPad Pro is substantially redesigned for the first time since its introduction in 2020
picks.notes:
• Federico's cohosts generously helped workshop some of the possible nitpicks out of the pick.
  • Ungraded: "function row, backlight, material change, multiple USB ports, different viewing angles"

picks.text: There is a new, larger, non-Pro iPad
picks.full-pick-text: There is a new, larger, non-Pro iPad

picks.text: There will be no second-generation Vision Pro announced in 2024
picks.full-pick-text: There will be no second-generation Vision Pro announced in 2024

picks.text: iOS 18 will bring new AI features based on LLMs with some generative capabilities
picks.full-pick-text: iOS 18 will bring new AI features based on LLMs with some generative capabilities

picks.text: A game made by a studio owned by Meta is released on Vision Pro
picks.full-pick-text: A game made by a studio owned by Meta is released on Vision Pro

picks.text: Apple's CEO succession plan leaks
picks.full-pick-text: Apple's CEO succession plan leaks
picks.notes:
• Midway through the year... an interesting development, but the grading debate hasn't been had yet.
  • Ultimately, Jason Snell adjudicates and gives the thumbs down.

picks.text: A new iPad Pro will feature...
picks.full-pick-text: A new iPad Pro will feature a front-facing camera on the landscape side, higher than 27W fast charging, and eventually support more than 4 windows in the same Stage Manager workspace
picks.notes:
• "... a front-facing camera on the landscape side, higher than 27W fast charging, and eventually support more than 4 windows in the same Stage Manager workspace."
  • Before the episode, this pick also included the detail of some models coming with more than 16 GB of RAM, but in keeping with the new, less outlandish tone of risky picks, Myke asked that it be toned down a bit.
  • In the new rules, this would've earned some points, but with some parts wrong, it's wrong.

picks.text: The M1 MacBook Air is still on sale at the end of the year
picks.full-pick-text: The M1 MacBook Air is still on sale at the end of the year

picks.text: The 9th-generation iPad is taken off the market by the end of the year
picks.full-pick-text: The 9th-generation iPad is taken off the market by the end of the year

picks.text: An updated iPad Air comes in at least one new color
picks.full-pick-text: An updated iPad Air comes in at least one new color
picks.notes:
• At pick time, the colors were: Space Gray, Starlight, Pink, Purple, and Blue.
  • After May 2024, the colors were: Blue, Purple, Starlight, Space Gray... so the exact opposite.

picks.text: Apple launches immersive video content using TV+ IP
picks.full-pick-text: Apple launches immersive video content using TV+ IP
picks.notes: • Stephen's original version of the pick was just about any immersive video, but that was already announced.

picks.text: AirPods Pro 3 launch with lossless support
picks.full-pick-text: AirPods Pro 3 launch with lossless support

picks.text: As a result of allowing sideloading on iPhone in certain countries, a major controversy about security and/or malware on iOS happens
picks.full-pick-text: As a result of allowing sideloading on iPhone in certain countries, a major controversy about security and/or malware on iOS happens

picks.text: Vision Pro will not be available in Italy in 2024
picks.full-pick-text: Vision Pro will not be available in Italy in 2024

picks.text: A Vision Pro will be used on the International Space Station
picks.full-pick-text: A Vision Pro will be used on the International Space Station

picks.text: You will be able to create Shortcuts with the new LLM-infused Siri in iOS 18
picks.full-pick-text: You will be able to create Shortcuts with the new LLM-infused Siri in iOS 18

picks.text: iPadOS 18 will feature new controls for audio input and output
picks.full-pick-text: iPadOS 18 will feature new controls for audio input and output

picks.text: New AirPods Max in 2024
picks.full-pick-text: New AirPods Max
picks.notes:
• This might be the year!
  • "Technically correct."

picks.full-pick-text: We will be able to watch 'Avatar: The Way of Water' in 3D on Vision Pro
